issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
During HIVE-20638 i found that org.mortbay.jetty exclusions from e.g. hadoop don't take effect, as the actual groupId of jetty is org.eclipse.jetty for most of the current projects, please find attachment (example for hive commons project).

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jetty_(web_server)#History
fields.summary: Remove needless org.mortbay.jetty from hadoop exclusions
